nodes.text: Koval Station was a transit space station orbiting Nam Chorios in the Nam Chorios system.

This station in 44 ABY served as a transit point for people that wanted to travel to the dangerous planet of Nam Chorios and, more importantly, to supervise the embargo of the lethal droch that carried the Death Seed infection. It also controlled the departure of all starships from the planet to prevent the infection from leaving the planet. It was authorized to fire on any transgressors, and it replaced the old Bleak Point Station on the planet's surface.
